none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 25, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Below this text, lurking behind the green highlighted text that says CONTROL GROUP, you will find five of the noisiest, most fukkd sounding minutes ever shared on The Escape. I know I've said before (many times) that bands are taking the noise punk thing to new heights, but this one is something different. There are songs in there...(somewhere)...but it's like they are breaking everything in an AM radio broadcast studio trying desperately to be heard. The mosh part in "Junk" is the thing that madness is made of. CONTROL FROUP is fukkn insane.  CONTROL GROUP

seo.title: Control Group - Control Group demo - Terminal Escape
